values:
<lj-cut text="survey">

50 Things to Know About Me but Never Thought to Ask:

1. Have you ever been searched by the cops?
I don't think so. 

2. Do you close your eyes on roller coasters?
Hell no. What's the fun in that?!

3. When's the last time you've been sleigh riding?
Uhm, if this means sledding than in February with Wes. laundry baskets make amazing sleds, for the record.

4.Would you rather sleep with someone else, or alone?
uhm, it depends. if its people that roll over on me or squish me against the wall... im not for that. but usually i dont mind sleeping with other people. alone is good though too.

5. Do you believe in Ghosts?
sometimes. though sometimes i think that we make ourselves think there are ghosts.

6. What's your 'Dirty Little Secret'?
its confidential = X

7. Do you think O.J. killed his wife?
gah. im not answering this.

8. Jennifer Aniston or Angelina Jolie?
jenn

9. Can you honestly say you know ANYTHING about politics?
i know very limited information.

10. Do you know how to play poker?
sort of.

11. Have you ever stayed up for 48 hours?
ive stayed up longer than that, really.

12. Do you kill bugs that are in the house?
yes!! eew.

13. Have you ever cheated on a test?
in high school, all the time. in college, never.

14. What's your current obsession?
my puppy.

15. Do you have a secret that no one knows but you?
most likely

16. Boston Red Sox or New York Yankees?
yankees

17. Have u ever ice skated?
back in the day

18. How often do you remember your dreams?
maybe once or twice a month.

19. When was the last time you laughed so hard you were crying?
uhm, dunno. i laugh pretty hard almost every day, but it's never tear producing.

20. Can you name 5 songs by The Beatles?
yup.

22. Do you believe in love at first sight?
i think love is based on a spiritual connection, not looks. therefore... i believe in love at first talk.

23. Do you know who Ba-Ba-Booey is?
no

24. Do you always wear your seat belt?
Yes, it saved my life once.

25. What talent do you wish you had?
i wish that i could... make clothes.

26. Do you like Suzie?
who the fuck is suzie? but prolly not. i tend to not get along with girly-girls.

27. Have you ever narrowly avoided a fatal accident?
if you call car wrecks fatal accidents, then yes. 

28. What do you wear to bed?
pj pants and a tank top usually.

29. Have you ever been caught stealing?
caught? never.

30. Does size matter?
you're asking the wrong person.

31. Do you truly hate anyone?
hate is a strong word. but no, not really.

32. Rock and Roll or Rap?
Rock.

33. If you could sleep with one famous person, who would it be?
ADAM BRODY!!

34. Do you have a relative in prison?
uhm, prolly one from my dad's side of the family.

35. Have you ever sang in front of the mirror like your favorite singer?
sang in front of the mirror? yes. like my favorite singer? negative.

36. Do you know how to play chess?
i used to.

37. What food do you find disgusting?
onions. meat loaf. jello.

38.Did you ever play, "I'll show you mine, if you show me yours?"
yeah... but i didnt hold up my end of the deal!!! haah sucker.

39. Have you ever made fun of your friends behind their back?
prolly. but i would say it to their face too.

40. Have you ever stood up for someone you hardly knew?
Yes.

41. Have you ever been punched in the face?
nope. people love me!! haha j/k.

42. When is the last time you threw up from drinking too much?
i left my bcom class to get sick on wednesday.

43. Have you ever walked out on a movie at the theater?
yes. and i got my money back for it, bitches.

44. Do you ever sit through a bad movie, just to see how bad it was?
no.

45. Would you consider yourself obsessed with anything/anyone?
quite possibly.

46. Have you ever met someone famous that you really wanted to meet?
nope. 

47. Have you ever been stood up?
nope. well not that i remember.

48. When's the last time you screamed at the top of your lungs?
im sure it was yelling someone's name on campus.

49. Did you ever do something that you didn't want to, but did it just to fit in?
most likely. i used to do dumb shit like that.

50. Was this fun?
uhm... it made me a little less bored.
</lj-cut>

worst pickup lines ever (or at least this weekend):

- "but i have a big cock". pretty self explainatory.

- "so, girl, what can you do with that tounge ring?" first of all... learn my name. second of all... uhh no.

- "you're beautiful. i love staring in your eyes." ok. this might have worked if i dindnt meet you five minutes ago. nice try though.

<lj-cut text="survey thingy">

YOU
[Relationship Status] - single
[Shoe size] - 8 1/2
[Siblings] - 1
[Pets] - grunt!

FAVORITES
[Color] - pink or green. more green now though...
[Number] - 7 or 16
[Animal] - i like squirrels?
[Book] - The Adventures of Huck Finn
[Flower] - White roses

DO YOU
[Twirl your hair?] - yeah sometimes
[Have tattoos?] - nope. im scared of commitment.
[Cheat on tests?] - nope. im just naturally a genius. HA.
[Like roller coasters?] - they're amazing!
[Wish you could live somewhere else?]- you know... i always wanted to get away from Louisville. But now I just wish I could go back. There's no place like home... you know?
[Like cleaning?] - i mean i dont necessarily LOVE to clean. But I don't mind it.
[Write in cursive or print?] - print
[Know how to drive?] - as long as it doesnt involve parallel parking. 
[Own a cell phone?] - well yeah
[Ever get off the internet?] - seldomly.

HAVE YOU EVER
[Been in a fist fight?] - cant say that i have.
[considered a life of crime?] - somewhat. after the whole school thought i was dealing drugs anyway, i should have just started.
[Considered being a hooker?] - hell no.
[Been in love?] - im not sure what love is. so... no.
[Made out with JUST a friend?] - yeah.
[Kicked someone in the nuts?]- once upon a time in elementary school.
[Current clothing] - cords and a blue sweater.
[Current hair] - in a ponytail.
[Current thing I ought to be doing] - prolly something more productive than this...
[Current CD in stereo] - ryan hunton's of montreal.
[Last movie you saw] - we watched briget jones the edge of reason last night.

RANDOM THINGS...
[Last thing you ate] - burrito from garret
[Believe there is life on other planets?] -yeah. i just don't think its humans.
[Read the newspaper?] - i have to for one of my classes. plus... i like to know whats going on in the world.
[Hate yourself?] - for some decisions. but regret is dumb.
[Collect anything?] - i used to collect care bears. now i just collect herpes.
[Like your handwriting] - ehh... its ok.

LOVE..
[First crush] - frank something or another in kindergarden. i kissed him on the bus and then he told me he wasn't allowed to kiss until he was 16. i was heartbroken.
[You believe in love at first sight?] - not really. it would be completely superficial and only based on physical attraction. 
[You believe in "the one?"] - yeah. i wish i could find him.
[Are you a tease?] - well... maybe sometimes.
[Too shy to make the first move?] - unless im intoxicated.


ARE YOU A...
[Daydreamer] - yeah.
[Sarcastic] - most of the time.
[Introvert] - sometimes.
[Extrovert] - sometimes.

WOULD YOU RATHER...
[Pierce your nose or lip?] - well i have my nose pierced.
[Be serious or funny?] - funny!!!!!!!!
ARE YOU...
[Simple or complicated?] - no one is simple.

ABOUT YOU...
[What time is it] - 1:49
[Name] - Rebecca Lynn Gibson
[Nickname(s)] - Becca, Sbeccles, hey you.

WHAT DO YOU WANT...
[Where do you want to live] - in a nice house in a nice suburb with a nice family. location isnt that important.
[how many kids do you want] - 2
[What kind of job do you want] - television news producer
[do you want to get married] - yes.  sometime in the future.

UNIQUE...
[Nervous Habits] - shaking my leg, twirling my hair, twirling my thumbs.
[Are you double jointed] - no
[Can you roll your tongue] - not really.
[Can you raise one eyebrow]- i dunno but i bet i look like a douche trying to do it in the computer lab...
[Can you cross your eyes] - yes
[Do you make your bed daily] - HAHAH. thats funny.

CLOTHES, ETC...
[Which shoe goes on first] - whichever one i pick up.
[Ever thrown one at someone] - well yeah.
[How Much money do you carry in your wallet] - it depends. most of the time i dont carry money. just my debit card.

IN THE LAST MONTH HAVE YOU...
[Bought something] - well yeah.
[Gotten sick] - not in the last month. but i say that and now i'll get sick as hell.
[Sang] - badly, but yes.
[Felt stupid] - i feel stupid daily. it keeps me in check.
[Missed someone] - everyday
[Gotten drunk] - yeah
[Gotten high] - yeah
[Danced crazy] - anytime i dance its crazy.
[Gotten your hair cut] - no but i need one.
[Watched cartoons] - family guy.

LAST PERSON THAT...
[Slept in your bed] - bryan?
[Saw you cry] - i dont even remember the last time i cried.
[Made you cry] - josh.
[Saw a movie with you] - crystal. but in theaters... i dont even remember.
[Said 'I love you' to you] - i think wes.

HAVE YOU EVER...
[Been to California] - no
[Been to Canada] - nope
[Been to Europe] - ive been to england.
[Wished you were the opposite sex] - NEVER!
[Snuck out of your house] - a few times.

</lj-cut>

dear parking gods:

please make up your mind and stop being so rediculous.

i the past 24 hours, ive gotten two parking tickets. for parking in the same spot. bitches. isnt one enough?

im sorry if i am not willing to risk my life to park in the gravel lot and walk back to minton at night... when its cold. should i really have to pay $40 for my safety?

but thanks for the parking spot in the minton lot. it was a nice touch to your crazy antics.

love, 
becca

blah blah blah.

yada yada yada.

sometimes i feel i want to say something... and then my mind draws a blank.

4. i live for the radom, stupid moments in life. like pictures in lunchboxes.
5. i mismatch my socks. everyday.

i tag...ashley, rachel, wes, winston, and crystal.

so... here i am back at school. moving back in was bittersweet because i missed this place and my friends so much but at the same time i am leaving some really amazing people back in louisville.

i kinda wonder why i signed up to be a western leader after today which consisted of me helping freshmen guys move their stuff into the top half of barnes. well... lines for the elevators were hellacious so i walked my ass up 7, 8, or 9 flights of stairs A LOT. oh but the best part was when it started storming and i got drenched (wearing a white t-shirt... of course). so then i had to walk up lots of stairs with wet socks and tennis shoes. not fun. but whatever, hopefully it wont rain tomorrow and i can just direct traffic like im supposed to do.

well i guess its time to dry my hair and get to bed. man, i hate getting up early.

happy birthday to meeeee!!!

too bad nothing cool happens when you turn 19...

IT HAS BEEN CALCULATED THAT IF EVERYONE IN THE UNITED STATES DID NOT PURCHASE A DROP OF GASOLINE FOR ONE DAY AND ALL AT THE SAME TIME, THE OIL COMPANIES WOULD CHOKE ON THEIR STOCKPILES.

AT THE SAME TIME IT WOULD HIT THE ENTIRE INDUSTRY WITH A NET LOSS OF OVER 4.6 BILLION DOLLARS WHICH AFFECTS THE BOTTOM LINES OF THE OIL COMPANIES.

THEREFORE MAY 19TH HAS BEEN FORMALLY DECLARED "STICK IT UP THEIR ASS" DAY AND THE PEOPLE OF THIS NATION SHOULD NOT BUY A SINGLE DROP OF GASOLINE THAT DAY.

THE ONLY WAY THIS CAN BE DONE IS IF YOU FORWARD THIS E-MAIL TO AS MANY PEOPLE AS YOU CAN AND AS QUICKLY AS YOU CAN TO GET THE WORD OUT.

WAITING ON THIS ADMIINSTRATION TO STEP IN AND CONTROL THE PRICES IS NOT GOING TO HAPPEN. WHAT HAPPENED TO THE REDUCTION AND CONTROL IN PRICES THAT THE ARAB NATIONS PROMISED TWO WEEKS AGO?

REMEMBER ONE THING, NOT ONLY IS THE PRICE OF GASOLINE GOING UP BUT AT THE SAME TIME AIRLINES ARE FORCED TO RAISE THEIR PRICES, TRUCKING COMPANIES ARE FORCED TO RAISE THEIR PRICES WHICH EFFECTS PRICES ON EVERYTHING THAT IS SHIPPED. THINGS LIKE FOOD, CLOTHING, BUILDING MATERIALS, MEDICAL SUPPLIES ETC. WHO PAYS IN THE END? WE DO!

WE CAN MAKE A DIFFERENCE. IF THEY DON'T GET THE MESSAGE AFTER ONE DAY, WE WILL DO IT AGAIN AND AGAIN.

MAN people need to get a life. From now on, this journal is friends only, kids. If for some reason you aren't on my friends list and want to be... leave a comment and I'll add you. 

<3 <3 lAteR hAtErS

ow. my abs hurt. i cant decide if "pick your spot pilattes" is my new friend or my new enemy. right now it seems to be the latter. but i guess that means ive been doing it right? because damn. it hurts to move.

its time for pajamas, hot chocolate (with marshmellows!!), the new issue of cosmo, and a whole lot of nothing. 

::sigh:: relaxation is amazing.

so life the past few days has consisted of work, work, and work. 

lets see... today... woke up on my own at 10? what the hell? anyway so i did laundry and cleaned up around here a bit... then watched sweet home alabama... then went to work. just got home. literally RAN from duc because it was fucking cold and i had a light jacket. lets just say that i never run. so yeah... it was cold.

ahh.... seeping into that tired old routine of school and work. sometimes i like that and others i hate it. havent made up my mind on that yet. well im tired and my back hurts and shanna's watching the o.c. so i think i might join her. later haters <3

::sigh:: im not in the mood for the redzone. it will most likely be ok once i get there. the hardest part is actually going. i think its about time for me to get a real job. one that may actually help me later in life? but until then i will do bullshit jobs and get paid small amounts. i hate that it will be forever until i get paid. at least two weeks, if not more. BOO. im broke. and i need groceries. i hate that theres nothing to drink here. it would be ok if there was no food, but i need beverages. theres no way in hell im drinking the tap water here. i tried it once, spit it out, and swore never to drink it again.

i decided 10 mins into my intro to philosophy class that it sucked ass. lets see... we went over the syllabus for about 5 mins. then the crazy mother fucker reads this poem and starts lecturing and whatnot. who lectures the first day of class? but i tried to pay attention the first 10 mins or so. after that i decided i was dropping that class and it would be a waste of my time to take the rest of the notes. so now im in a psychology class. but its a bi-term which doesnt start until march something or another. so i have one class tuesdays and thursdays. w00t.

ummm... other than that... it feels nice to get back into the swing of things. here my life is routine and planned out where as at home it was not at all. i like the craziness, but a girl needs some stability every once in a while. plus, i dont just feel like a loser anymore because i do productive things. which is a plus. i actually kinda like being back in my dorm room too. its weird, i know. but it just feels cozy again.

but i guess this is enough rambling.

<3 <3

so... classes went ok, i guess. its hot as hell in here as usual. last night i woke up miserable because it was so hot. so that sucks. and just for the record, 8 am is way to early for me to get up. but anyway today i went to mass communications laws and ethics. well i didnt really realize it would be a class all about LAW. i mean, yeah, i should have inferred that. but i didnt. we're doing case studies and yada yada all that mess. so i cant decide if i will like that class yet or not... but it seems really hard. so after that i have my process and effects of mass media class. which im not real sure what thats all about yet. but it doesnt seem that hard. it doesnt really seem interesting though either. then came american national government. i might actually enjoy that class. professor kash seems really cool. he is laid back and funny and stuff. so that should be good. 

so after classes i went to eat lunch with stephanie, rachel, and a bunch of her friends. then i went to work to give them my schedule for the tv station and request off for the weekend of the concert. then i got my books. i hope i have all the ones i need. i was kinda in a hurry, but i got a book for each of my classes. that cost about $243. which is about a hundred dollars more than last semester. 

wow. this is all really boring. i know no one really cares about it because hell i dont even care that much. but now im bored because i dont really have anything to do. so im going to go crawl into bed and either read this month's cosmo or this book crystal let me borrow called "he's just not that into you". later haters <3

"i suggest we learn to love ourselves before its made illegal"...

hahaha. family conversations can be crazy sometimes. we went to my dad's side of the family's house today... let me just say it wasnt boring. my favorite quote was when my aunt said something to my 15 year old cousin, Tessa, and she said "what? theres a keg here? where?" isnt that funny. my whole family just laughed and talked about how much funnier it would be if we all got drunk at christmas. so a little bit later we were talking about how hairy my unlce John was and so he took his shirt off and gave my cousin-in-law (?) Casey a lap dance. that was some funny shit, for real. i forget sometimes that i like my family...

merry christmas eve!!!

so last night since we were snowed in i asked my mom if i could open one of my presents. so ive been watching the first season of 'the oc' for HOURS now. theres 27 episodes and they are each 45 mins long. that makes for a lot of preppy rich kids for me to watch the next few days... so thats how i will be spending my time. yeah, this was a pretty pointless update... but i was bored. so more adam brody now <3

the past few days have went by really quick. ive gotten to see everyone, i think. even if it was just for a few minutes. 

i love christmas time. if only it could be warm out i would be super happy. but anyway, yeah. it just makes me happy. 

wanna hear what else makes me happy? here are my grades for first semester

Astronomy: A
Broadcasting: isnt posted yet but an A
English: A
Self Defense: A
University Experience: A
Western Civ: not posted yet either but most likely a B

soooo... this brings me to a 3.83 GPA which makes me feel accomplished.
just thought i would post this for laughs my tounge was the size of texas!

Today we salute you- Stressed Out College Student During Exam Week. As you sit in your lonely cubical in the library, doped up on Starbucks & Adderall, you think to yourself, am I ever going to need to know this stuff in life? The distractions are tempting, and you have suddenly diagnosed yourself with ADD, along with advanced delusionary schizophrenia with involuntary narcissistic rage. I'm sure by now you know exactly what everyone is doing because you have checked your buddy list 800 times. Christmas break is just days away, and your Prozac prescription will be in tomorrow. So crack open an ice cold Bud Light after that last exam, because for most of us, Christmas will be spent in rehab.

YAY FRIENDS!!

i am now offically not stressed anymore. 

bcom final i was pretty confident about. im failrly sure i will get an a in there.

western civ final went much better than expected. im pretty sure i will get a low b in there. woohoo!

the rest of the week is cake and then i get to go home for christmas yayyyy!!!!

if you cant tell, i am in a much better mood... like i said i would be.

YAY FRIENDS!!

i am now offically not stressed anymore. 

bcom final i was pretty confident about. im failrly sure i will get an a in there.

western civ final went much better than expected. im pretty sure i will get a low b in there. woohoo!

the rest of the week is cake and then i get to go home for christmas yayyyy!!!!

if you cant tell, i am in a much better mood... like i said i would be.

You Are the Enthusiast
7
You are outgoing and playful - always seeing the happy side to life. You're enthusiastic and excitable. You love anything new. Multi-talented, you do many things well... and find success easy. You prefer to keep things light with others. Opening up is hard for you.
What number are you?
so... two finals down and 4 more to go. i think whoever decided all wku students need to take western civ should be found and shot in the face. thats all i have to say right now.
im the cool kid who is spending saturday night studying for finals. havent gotten much studying done though. but i am skankalicious. havent showered since thursday. yummy.

things in life are stressful right now.

things at work SUCK. so i called in saturday or whatever and everyone was pissed because they thought i was lying, even though they never said it to my face. so i go in sunday and feel like shit all day. whatever. so monday night was ok, i guess. i dont think im the favorite anymore. and i go in to check the schedule yesterday and im scheduled to work sunday, monday and wednesday night next week. i have 3 finals on tuesday 1 of which is over almost 70 pages of notes. so i requested off for monday night because obviously i need to study. so even though im scheduled, im not fucking working that night. school is more important to me than that job. and since i work wednesday night, i have to stay here until thursday instead of leaving wednesday afternoon. so im about to go to work in an hour or so and im going to talk to them about all of it and if they dont schedule me off im giving them the big "fuck you" and leaving. i dont want to do that because i like having an on campus job because it means i get to go home during breaks and dont have to work here during the summer and its  just easier. and if i quit there, then that wouldnt really work out as easily.


so anyway. some good news is that if i can make at least a 36% on my astronomy final, then ill get an a. so i most likely wont even study for that which will give me more time to study for western civ. AAHHHHH. i didnt want to get stressed about all of this but its slowly happening. i should just start studying but that would be too rational... 


um. i think something funny/interesting happened today. but i forgot about it. maybe ill remember and ill post later...
